alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hastings to near Lake George. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, Andalusia, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland and Crescent Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
